    • validate

      default ca.uhn.fhir.validation.ValidationResult validate(org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseResource resource)
      Perform a validation on the given IBaseResource.

      As default implementation, the resource is serialized to a json-string and then validated. This is basically the same as behaviour the HAPI does under the hood with the only difference that the HAPI implementation does override resource-ids with bundle-entry-full-urls by default which can lead to issues.

      NOTE: use with caution as the HAPI validation on IBaseResource (especially in Bundle Resources) is quite buggy. Therefore, prefer validating on the raw content whenever possible.

      Parameters:
      resource - to be validated
      Returns:
      the ValidationResult

    • isValid

      default boolean isValid(String content)
      Perform a validation on the given content and extract the overall result from the ValidationResult
      Parameters:
      content - to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the ValidationResult was successful or false otherwise
